name: Politoed
author: Tomokazu Komiya
flavor_text: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.

abilities.name: Frog Song
abilities.effect: Whenever Politoed’s attack damages the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), if there are more than 3 Poliwags, Poliwhirls, Poliwraths, and/or Politoeds in play (including your opponent’s), that attack does 40 more damage (no matter how many heads you get). This power stops working while Politoed is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.
